text: thumb Jean-Charles Taugourdeau (born July 17, 1953 in Dreux) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Maine-et-Loire department, and is a member of the Republicans. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Dreux Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:The Strong Right Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Charles Taugourdeau
